direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing and validating parameters related to gift card operations.
Both methods handle similar types of input validation and may throw similar exceptions.
Both methods involve sending signed requests with similar parameter checks and request structures.
Both methods access and process token-related information, though for different purposes.
Both methods may involve setting up or accessing cryptographic keys or similar state-related operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a properly initialized RequestHandler for sending signed requests.
Verifying the gift card code before redeeming can help ensure the code is valid and prevent unnecessary redemption attempts.
Checking the redemption status can help verify if the redemption was successful and handle any exceptions accordingly.
